HyphalTip.description: A general concept representing any thread or idea in one's life, such as an idea, project, or ongoing interest.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

description.description: A brief description of an entity.

activityStatus.description: The current activity status of a HyphalTip (e.g., 'alive', 'dormant', 'completed', 'archived').

mergedWith.description: Links a HyphalTip to another HyphalTip it has merged with.

forkedFrom.description: Links a HyphalTip to another HyphalTip it branched from.

buildsOn.description: Links a HyphalTip to another HyphalTip it builds upon or develops from.

inspiredBy.description: Links a HyphalTip to another HyphalTip that inspired it.

supersedes.description: Links a HyphalTip to another HyphalTip it supersedes or makes obsolete.

involvedWith.description: Links a HyphalTip to an Organization it is associated with.

collaborator.description: Links a HyphalTip to a Person who is a collaborator.

hasNote.description: Links a HyphalTip to a related Note.

hasMeeting.description: Links a HyphalTip to a related Meeting.

hasActionItem.description: Links a HyphalTip to a related Action Item.

Project.description: A structured endeavor with defined stages.

status.description: The current stage or status of a project (e.g., 'idea', 'planning', 'in-progress', 'on-hold', 'completed', 'archived').

startDate.description: The start date of a project or meeting.

endDate.description: The end date of a project or meeting.

Organization.description: A group or institution, e.g., a workplace, club, or community.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

Person.description: An individual, e.g., a collaborator, friend, or contact.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

Note.description: A piece of written information or observation.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

Meeting.description: A scheduled gathering for discussion or collaboration.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

startDate.description: The start date of a project or meeting.

endDate.description: The end date of a project or meeting.

ActionItem.description: A specific task or step to be completed.

name.description: The name or title of an entity.

dueDate.description: The due date for an action item.

assignedTo.description: The person assigned to an action item.
